name: Thor's Night Out
description:
Hello everyone!

Thor's Night Out is about the day my dog got lost for a whole night! He came back next morning and i figured "What adventure has he got into?"

It's a 2D Platformer Game with beautiful scenes where you play with a cute dog!

This is my first game and i'm working in codes, arts and sounds! I'm  still studying Game Development and Game Art so any feedback and advice are  wellcome.

There's a lot of work ahead, keep up with my progress and uploads on my instagram @drmurilov and my Devlog.

Thank you!
